name: HexFloor
description:
Welcome To HexFloor!

This is a platformer game about a witch using her power to get through!

How does it fit the theme?  To be able to progress, you have to spawn platforms and the only way to obtain them is by dying.

-------------------------------------------

Controls:
  • [W] and [A] / Arrow Keys to move.
  • K to spawn a platform
  • Space to Jump
  • [R] to Restart

-------------------------------------------

Credits:
  • Programming: Afif Zughayer
  • Art: Ayham Nassar
  • Music ("Dungeon"): Afif Zughayer

-------------------------------------------

Tools used:
  • Unity
  • Piskel
  • FL Studio 20 (32-bit)

-------------------------------------------

Made in under 24 hours for the Wowie!Jam 3.0
